home.description1: I'm Wessel, a {age}-year-old full-stack software developer with {exp} year(s) of experience. I’m skilled in building both the front-end and back-end of web applications, including creating databases and integrating software to Azure through CI/CD pipelines. I ensure that all components work seamlessly together, delivering fully integrated, end-to-end solutions.
home.description2: I’ve been in love with Norway, its culture and language since childhood, and moving there is a dream I've always had. I speak fluent Norwegian, and working in Norway—whether remotely or, ideally, in-office—is my top priority. I’m excited to take the necessary steps to make this childhood dream a reality!

hu.description: Completed a 4-year bachelor's degree with a focus on software development, including web development, databases and system design/architecture. Specialized in web development and design.

mysolution.description: Designed and developed a fully customizable web platform using React, TypeScript, and Java Spring, taking full ownership of the project to ensure GDPR compliance, secure JWT authentication, a SQLite-backed Salesforce integration, and robust backend support for personalized business websites.

hjemvik.description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce platform for Hjemvik, a Norwegian company, using React with TypeScript and Java Spring. Focused on creating a sleek, responsive design and a seamless user experience, delivering a tailored solution for the company’s online presence.

languages.title: Languages
languages.norwegian: Norwegian - Work profiency and close to native. (C1)
